messages.message:
Was the GCP plugin one of the updated plugins?
Wondering if that’ll get us past this “nah you only need 5 GCP nodes even though the cap is set to 15” thing we see. :smile:
`"nah you only need 5 GCP nodes even though the cap is set to 15` what is this that you were referring to?

I’ve noticed at times that we’ll have all executors on the GCP `build-machine-auto` nodes busy, and I have to wait for an executor or node to be available - but it won’t provision new nodes beyond the 5 that happen to be up at the time

It’s not the most frequent thing usually, but it is an odd annoying behavior
It hasn’t been frequent enough for me to want to dig into the plugin, but I suspected it was a bug in there somewhere
Ok let’s move to a separate thread in a more proper channel for follow up as the description of the issue here is rather fuzzy and team specific, I don’t have a quick answer for that
